alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 28 at 8:18PM CDT until May 28 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT/745 PM MDT/ FOR NORTH CENTRAL CHERRY COUNTY... At 818 PM CDT/718 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cody, or 33 miles southeast of Martin, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cody, Kilgore, Nenzel, Medicine Lake, Cody Lake, Eli, Steer Creek Campground and Schoolhouse Lake. This includes Highway 20 between mile markers 146 and 178. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
